Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Colorado in 2017...
Traded from Colorado to Chicago on 3/2/2017 (Going to COL: C Sandwich Pick Trade. Going to CHI: P Benjamin Haupt)...
Injured on 4/23/2017 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 7/25/2017 (Going to NY: P Benjamin Haupt. Going to CHI: P Jeremy Fletcher, P Raymond Zerbe, P Bruce Wachtel)...
Traded from New York to Atlanta on 6/10/2018 (Going to NY: P Timothy Egerton. Going to ATL: P Benjamin Haupt, P Jame Meany, P Joseph Hedgepeth, P Phillip Reed)...
Earned first career win on 7/4/2018...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2018, going 6-0, 1.26...
Traded from Atlanta to Detroit on 6/15/2021 (Going to ATL: RF Gregory Arrington. Going to DET: P Benjamin Haupt)...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $871,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/4/2022 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2022, going 3-1, 0.99...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/8/2022 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/4/2022 with a Broken Finger, out for 7 weeks...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,292,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 7/5/2023 (Going to DET: C James Desir, LF Daniel Delee, P Anselmo Herrera, 3B Christopher Meehan, 2B James Gallucci. Going to STL: C Manuel Rodarte, 3B Cedr
ick Fernandez, P Benjamin Haupt)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $6,292,857 through salary arbitration...
8/4/2024: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $14,750,000 per year, for 4 years.
